Following a strategy learned from social media influencer** (Chef Mikey learned from Daniel Mays' no-till methods on Instagram.)
Tarping to kill vegetation** (Used tarps to kill existing grass in preparation for garden beds.)
Weed removal** (Dug up surviving weeds after tarping.)
Planting rye grass as a cover crop** (Broadcasted rye grass seed in October, allowing it to grow over winter.)
Crimping and mulching the cover crop** (Used a pallet to flatten the rye grass, covered with a silage tarp to kill it and serve as mulch.)
Adding compost to garden beds** (Installed compost (6-8 inches deep) on top of the mulched cover crop in spring.)
Measuring and building raised beds** (Measured and built 30-inch beds with 14-inch walkways using string for layout.)

tasks.task: Planning and preparing a market garden**
subtasks: Securing materials and tools** (Obtained compost, tools, and materials for garden construction.)
Broadcasting rye grass seed during rainy weather** (Planted rye grass seed when it was pouring to ensure quick growth.)
Crimping down the cover crop for mulch** (Used a pallet to flatten the rye grass before mulching.)
Positioning silage tarps to cover mulch** (Placed silage tarps over the mulch to smother remaining weeds.)
Harvesting vegetables and managing weeds** (Continual vegetable harvesting and control of emerging weeds.)
Ensuring proper drainage and moisture levels** (Managed water conditions to prevent issues like drowning seedlings or excessive weeds.)
Monitoring for pests and diseases** (Watched for and addressed any pest or disease problems.)
